thread.section_title: Capo d'Africa Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Birthday surprise!
thread.title_full: Birthday surprise! - Review of Capo d'Africa Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Tania H
title: Birthday surprise!
text: Very nice welcoming hotel with friendly staff! Stayed in for 3 nights, quite-corner room with an amazing bad! It sound crazy, but after 20.000 of steps by day thru Rome, after a good Italian wine and pasta, all you need in the evening is a conformable bad :) clean! Good breakfast! Nice terrace! Near city center, take your very comfortable shoes and be in LOVE with Rome!
